definition: to wipe/to erase/rubbing (brush stroke in painting)/to clean/to polish
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: Can you oil my leather shoes?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我的皮鞋擦一擦油吗？

sentences.english: Having been used for a long time , the bike needs oiling.
sentences.chinese: 这辆自行车用久了，需要擦油。

sentences.english: Oil it regularly to prevent rust .
If the water is serious, it is best to immediately go to the repair shop to rub oil treatment.
sentences.chinese: 若进水严重，最好立即到修理店进行擦油处理。

sentences.english: But it needs to be polished every week.

definition: to apply (ointment, powder)/to smear/to paint on
to bubble/to foam/to blister/to sprout boils (on one's body)/sparkling (wine etc)
outer skin/surface/leather cover (of a book)/drum skin/leather upper (of a shoe)
oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning
